dedicatedCloud_datacenters_upgrade_range: Discover your next-generation Managed Bare Metal solution
Discover your next-generation Hosted Private Cloud solution
vSphere-as-a-Service is simple and familiar, easy to manage and cost-effective.
It is a powerful, integrated enterprise solution based on industry-standard software, with a focus on both performance and resilience.
Essentials powered by VMware
New hosts
Intel processors for stability and performance, with a range of 64GB, 128GB and 256GB hosts.
New datastores
A full range of SSD datastores, from 3TB to 36TB of fully-dedicated storage capacity.
vROps
Advanced monitoring with vROps is now integrated into standard pricing, to analyse and manage your infrastructure at no additional cost.
Premier powered by VMware
Next-generation Intel processors providing optimal stability and performance, and new resource reallocation with 48GB to 768GB RAM per host.
A full range of SSD datastores, from 3TB to 36TB of fully-dedicated storage capacity.
Increased bandwidth
By default, the solution includes increased network options of up to 25Gbit/s, which are now accessible for public and private networks.
